description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a list of Restaurant objects in an Android UI. It manages view creation, data binding, efficient updates with DiffUtil, and user interactions such as clicking on a restaurant or toggling its favorite status.

classes.name: RestaurantAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView ListAdapter for Restaurant objects, handling view creation, data binding, and user interactions.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for RestaurantAdapter, holds references to UI elements for each list item.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for determining item differences efficiently in the list.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and inflates the view holder for each restaurant item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds restaurant data to the view holder, handles UI updates and user interactions.
